SEARCH
Package controller

Class GalleryController

java.lang.Object
controller.GalleryController
public class GalleryController extends Object
GalleryController class is the controller for the gallery view. It allows the user to add photos to the album, remove photos from the album, set captions for photos, display photos separately, edit tags for photos, copy photos to other albums, move photos to other albums, and return to the homepage.
Author:
jacobjude, ks1686
